roleset.name: convert into vapor
roleset.note: VAPORIZE-V NOTES: frame by Perryn. VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls destroy-44, other_cos-45.4. (from vaporize.01-v)

example.name: look out below
example.text: [Most of the station]-1 is expected *-1 to vaporize as it comes down, some fragments splashing into the Pacific Ocean.

example.name: both args
example.text: The test completely vaporized the island of Elugelab as well as portions of Sanil and Teiter, leaving a crater 164 feet (50 meters) deep.
example.arg: the island of Elugelab as well as portions of Sanil and Teiter
leaving a crater 164 feet (50 meters) deep
